comments.author: Arlise.1842
comments.body: I was switching back and forth between the two and settled for this, but thank you for letting me know! (: I’ll remake this in GW2 Discussions then.

comments.author: Alcarin.9024
comments.body:
I don’t think that this is the right forum. This forum talk only about GW2 API (interface between GW2 game and external applications). So it’s not related to any other side of GW2 development.
Other than that, this forum is pratically not followed by any developer.
I think that right forum could be “GW2 Discussions”.

comments.author: Arlise.1842
comments.body:
Hey everyone! I’m not entirely sure this is the correct forum for specifically this development question (but it seemed most appropriate). Basically, as the title states, I’m curious about the process that GW2 designers & developers go through to design and implement armor sets in the game.

What programs are specifically used?
Are there any A-net supplied files associated with the programs (like character models) that can be used as bases to build off of?

Thanks a ton!
